FuncDef: This command configures, in seconds, the time that a GTP session context is held after the corresponding User Equipment is disconnected. If the same User Equipment re-connects to this system before this time has elapsed, its GTP session context is re-used. When the timer expires, the GTP session context is cleared.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the timer is equal to the User Equipment s DHCP remaining lease time.
Specifies the time, in seconds, to hold a GTP session after its UE is disconnected. Values-0 to 3600.
